name: HOMEPAGE_AD_1
body_text:
Forget about the fuss of getting there: we are sure you'll like our one-click vacation packages!

From the tropical getaways of Bali to the snowy alps of Switzerland, you're sure to find an adventure that interests you.

Limited slots available! What are you waiting for?

name: HOMEPAGE_AD_2
body_text:
Is your current car insurance giving you a headache? Say no to complicated plans and check out our Supreme Coverage Plan!

Insurance that is transparent, cost-effective, and easy to understand: Say bye-bye to all the stress!

name: HOMEPAGE_AD_3
body_text:
Fly like a royal this Christmas! We are delighted to partner with Royal Air to giveaway discount vouchers worth up to $500 to 10 lucky winners!

Simply follow a few easy steps and stand a chance to win; terms and conditions apply. Sign ups close on Nov 15.

name: HOMEPAGE_AD_4
header: Gift for That Special Someone This Season.
body_text:
Surprise a special someone this season with our limited edition credit card, jam packed with seasonal promotions and perks!

By giving someone this card, you can stand a chance to win an all-inclusive travel package! What are you waiting for? Spread the joy!
